column5: This is a great little condo for a single traveler or couple. It has street entrance and garage entrance. It has gated covered parking directly out your back door. It is walking distance to the convention center, bars and restaurants. It is less than a block from The Dallas Dart Rail and minuted from the Central Business District. It has a full kitchen, washer-dryer, refrigerator and dishwasher. It is stocked with cooking utensils, pots, pans, plates & glasses. Great for extended stays.
